channel.title: CVE Feed for Felix Moira -- Popup More Popups
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Felix Moira -- Popup More Popups

item.title: CVE-2024-32800|2024-06-06T17:35:12.917Z -- felix%20moira -- popup%20more%20popups
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Felix Moira Popup More Popups allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Popup More Popups: from n/a through 2.3.1.
